content.rendered:
Helping institutions be in the driver's seat

Institution Brochure
The Adventus.io marketplace provides ultimate control and transparency over your student recruitment. Empowering institutions with intelligent recruitment tools to unlock faster and better quality outcomes.
View
Play Video

Adventus.io Marketplace Explainer

Discover how Adventus.io helps institutions attract quality applications, diversity their student cohort and meet enrollment targets.
View
Adventus.io Professional Services
Expert services to take on the heavy lifting and ensure you provide a market-leading service to international students and agents, without changing your systems or process.
View
Adventus.io Premium Partnerships
Learn about bespoke partnerships tailored to achieve your institution’s goals for maximum impact
View
Play Video
Collegedunia, India

See how Adventus.io helped Collegedunia access more study destinations and institutions while maintaining the perfect balance of offering the best outcome for their students and growing business revenue.

View

Company Profile

Learn how the Adventus.io marketplace provides tools and access to help institutions rebuild and take control over their student pipeline.
View
Play Video

A word from our founder

Adventus.io is a radically transparent marketplace which helps students make confident study decisions through a trusted platform that connects the world’s institutions, recruiters & service providers.
View
Trusted by 0+ institutions globally
BROWSE OUR PARTNERS

Want to learn more?

Please get in touch, our partnership specialists would be happy to share more insights and advice about recruitment solutions for your institution.
TALK TO AN EXPERT NOW
SIGN UP
